giops_fc_2dll.name: GIOPS Forecast Surface - LatLon
giops_fc_2dll.attribution: The Canadian Centre for Meteorological and Environmental Prediction
giops_fc_2dll.help:
Global Ice Ocean Prediction System 
     
  • Global Coverage
    •  
  • Tri-polar ORCA grid 1/4° resolution (ORCA025), < 15km in Arctic
    •  
  • 50 vertical z-levels
    •  
  • Available as monthly averages (May 2014–April 2015)
    •  
  • Variables Available: 
       
    • Ice Concentration
      •  
    • Ice Volume
      •  
    • Meridional Wind
      •  
    • Salinity
      •  
    • Sea Surface Height (Free Surface)
      •  
    • Sea Water Velocity
      •  
    • Sea Water East Velocity
      •  
    • Sea Water North Velocity
      •  
    • Sea Water X Velocity
      •  
         
      • water velocity along model x grid lines
        •  
       
    • Sea Water Y Velocity
      •  
         
      • water velocity along model y grid lines
        •  
       
    • Water Temperature
      •  
    • Wind
      •  
    • Zonal Wind
      •  
     
    •

glorys3.help:
Global Ocean Reanalysis and Simulation -   System Sheet 
     
  • Global Coverage
    •  
  • 1/4° Mercator grid
    •  
  • 75 vertical z-levels
    •  
  • Available as monthly averages (January 1993–December 2013)
    •  
  • Variables Available: 
       
    • Eastward Velocity
      •  
    • Ice Concentration
      •  
    • Northward Velocity
      •  
    • Salinity
      •  
    • Sea Ice Eastward Velocity
      •  
    • Sea Ice Northward Velocity
      •  
    • Sea Ice Thickness
      •  
    • Sea Ice Velocity
      •  
    • Sea Surface Height
      •  
    • Sea Water Velocity
      •  
    • Temperature
      •  
     
    •
glorys3.name: GLORYS v3
